name: Basic Index Test (Manual Block -> Index -> Query)
description: Perform a basic end-to-end test of the LlamaIndex vector store: manually create a MemoryBlock, convert it to a LlamaIndex Node, index it in ChromaDB, and perform a simple semantic query.
action_items: [ ] Define a sample `MemoryBlock` instance (in code, not from Dolt yet).
[ ] Implement a basic function to convert a `MemoryBlock` to a LlamaIndex `Node` (initially just text and basic metadata).
[ ] Connect to the initialized ChromaDB store.
[ ] Create a LlamaIndex `VectorStoreIndex` from the ChromaDB store.
[ ] Create a query engine from the index.
[ ] Perform a semantic query related to the sample block's content.
test_criteria: The semantic query successfully retrieves the manually created and indexed Node.
